CPSC 217 - Introduction to Computer Science for Multidisciplinary Studies I

University of Calgary - Fall 2014, Winter 2015, Fall 2015, Winter 2016.

Instructors: Ben Stephenson and Nelson Wong.

  • Lecture slides on Python Loops and nested loops.

  • Codes on Python Loops.

  • Codes on Graphics using SimpleGraphics library.

  • Codes on Python Functions.

  • Codes on Python Lists.

  • Codes on Python Dictiony.

TA observation report from departmental head TA.

TA evaluations by sudents: W16 and W15.



CSE 403/404 - Computer Graphics

Ahasanullah University of Science and Technology, Spring 2014.

  • Lecture slides on Line Drawing and Circle Drawing algorithm.

  • Lecture slides on Getting started with OpenGl and sample codes.

  • Lecture slides on Projection and sample codes.

  • Lecture slides on Texture mapping and sample codes.

  • Lecture slides on Implementing mathematical models and a sample project.
